programme.title: The Queen Of News 2 Ep05
programme.desc: After leaving SNK, Man Wai Sum joins Lau Yim's new media company Open Platform, continuing her rivalry with Koo Siu Wah & Cheung Ka Yin in the competitive news world.

programme.title: The Fading Gold Ep25
programme.desc: After a car crash, Fong Yeung Tin shocks everyone by marrying a wife 30 years younger & placing the family fortune in a rival-ran trust, triggering family lawsuits & a hunt for the hidden mastermind.
